data: GYN Gynecology Day Surgery - Post Operative (Multiphase)
PACU Nurse to initiate "Phase I: PACU and Surgical Day Care (SDC)" Only
Discontinue GYN Gynecology Pre Operative (Day of Surgery) PowerPlan
Give patient instruction sheet if applicable
If post void residual is greater than 300 mL on two occasions
Indwelling, PRN, if unable to void after 3 hours or post void residual greater than 300 mL on two occasions
Teach patient urinary catheter care and maintenance prior to discharge
Teach patient intermittent self-catheterization if unable to void after three hours or post void residual is greater than 300 mL on two occasions
Electrolytes Panel (Na, K, Cl, CO2, Anion Gap)
SDC Nurse to initiate this phase upon patient's arrival to Surgical Day Care (SDC)
Patient meets discharge criteria when medically stable, pain managed with oral analgesics, voiding independently, bowels functioning tolerating regular diet, and independent with ADLs
If patient is greater than 60 years of age, consider lower rate
Continuous fluids should only be for 24 hours and reassess in AM
order rate: 75 mL/h, IV, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: bag
